item.description:
A joint meeting of the UMass College Democrats, the Amherst Democratic Town Committee, and Pioneer Valley DFA - hosted by the UMass Democrats.

Speakers on the agenda include Pat Duffy and John Bonifaz (founder of the National Voting Rights Institute), as well as information about the upcoming conference at UMass in November.

UMass Amherst Campus Center Basement - Room 165-69, at the bottom of the escalators.

For more information, see http://www.umassdems....
item.name: Amherst Democrats/UMass Democrats joint meeting
